name: reactsanitypwa
description: A PWA is an app that is hosted on the web but has enhanced capabilities to make the application feel native on any device. For a general description of the requirements of a PWA, please see the [readme](https://github.com/merziy/Coding-exercises/tree/main/prog-web-app/hello-world-web-app) for my basic progressive web application project. The biggest reason a PWA architecture is useful is because it carries the ability to use a website offline
author: Alexander Mathis <alexzandermathis@gmail.com>
